## ChatToggle (component)

The ChatToggle component toggles the visibility of the chat component.

### Import

```typescript
import { ChatToggle } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

## Usage

```tsx
<LiveKitRoom>
  <ToggleChat />
</LiveKitRoom>
```
